title: Convenience of Access
text: Digital libraries allow access to a vast array of journals and articles from anywhere with an internet connection. 📚💻

title: Time Efficiency
text: Digital libraries are available $$\frac{24}{7}$$, eliminating the need to adhere to physical library hours. ⏰

title: Search Functionality
text: Advanced search tools in digital libraries help quickly locate specific information or topics. 🔍

hintAnswer: He can access a wide range of journals from anywhere at any time.
title: Why Choose Digital?
text: Consider the benefits of accessibility, time efficiency, and search capabilities.
choices: He can access a wide range of journals from anywhere at any time
He prefers reading on a screen
He needs physical copies of the journals
